short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search BTS Flight Data to get aircraft registration info into OpenFlights

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make your OpenFlights data more complete with this shortcut to look up aircraft registration details for flights operating within the USA. Click the icon on a flight entry or edit page and the system will automatically display the aircraft registration N-Number if it is a domestic US flight since 1995 with the DoT filing the data.

Just make sure to save your changes after the info is added!

v0.1.3 - Support for https on OpenFlights site
